head.title: zindex (unsafe)
head.description: Rebases z-index values. This is unsafe as it could potentially clash with other stylesheets, or JavaScript injected styles. However, it isâ€¦

body: Rebases z-index values. This is unsafe as it could potentially clash with other stylesheets, or JavaScript injected styles. However, it is safe if your stacking context has wholly been extracted into CSS.
